title: James Nash shooting: Children's author and councillor dies
description: James Nash was described as a "kind-hearted individual and a proactive parish councillor".

title: Maurizio Sarri sacked as Juventus manager after one season
description: Italian giants Juventus sack Maurizio Sarri after their Champions League last-16 defeat by Lyon.

title: Coronavirus: Preston young people targeted as lockdown imposed
description: The advice follows a "significant" spike among under-30s as tighter restrictions come into force.

title: Home Office seeks MoD help over migrant crossings
description: It follows suggestions the Royal Navy could be brought in to patrol Channel traffic.

title: Coronavirus: Face covering use expanded in England and Scotland
description: The new rules apply to cinemas, museums and places of worship as more quarantine restrictions start.

title: Coronavirus: Randox recalls up to 750,000 test kits over safety concerns
description: Some kits sent to care homes should be returned, but the government says the risk to safety is low.

title: Beirut explosion: Angry protesters set to take to streets
description: Lebanese furious with their political leaders after a massive explosion want to vent their fury.

title: World Snooker Championship: Neil Robertson spills coffee
description: Neil Robertson's weekend gets off to a bad start when he spills his coffee ahead of his second round match against Barry Hawkins at the World Snooker Championship.

title: England v Pakistan: Rory Burns shushes Pakistan team after lbw dismissal
description: Rory Burns is trapped lbw for 10 by Mohammed Abbas and then exchanges words with the Pakistan team and shushes them on the way back to the dressing room

title: Coronavirus: Millions for small business 'sitting in council accounts'
description: Government grants for small firms have to be claimed by the end of August.

title: Murdered on the London Underground
description: The BBC followed Tashan Daniel's best friend Leon Haque as he attended the gruelling murder trial.

title: Coronavirus: Last-ditch talks on new aid package for US economy fail
description: With benefits expired for millions of jobless and mass evictions looming, lawmakers go on holiday.

title: The Papers: Brits pack beaches as travellers 'kept in dark'
description: Britons packing out beaches and a warning about the UK's quarantine policy are among the front page stories.

title: Coronavirus Vietnam: The mysterious resurgence of Covid-19
description: A central Vietnamese city is back in lockdown as researchers search for the source of a new outbreak.

title: Coronavirus: India is turning to faster tests to meet targets
description: With coronavirus cases rising sharply, India has turned to rapid testing kits. But how reliable are they?
